Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Updated: No Trains Between Harlem (FP Branch) and Forest Park Terminal
ShortDescription: Blue Line service partially resumed, remains suspended between Forest Park terminal & Harlem (FP Branch) due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Blue Line has partially resumed, but remains suspended between the Forest Park terminal and Harlem (FP Branch) due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating as follows:

  • between O'Hare and Harlem (Forest Park Branch), only

Shuttle buses are available between UIC/Halsted and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
